text: Is there a way to run `HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin` with additional error logging?
what is the proper way of setting the --env.account and --env.autoupload values?

I have 2 separate projects, one where I am not setting them at all and it works perfectly. And another where I've tried setting them and not setting them (npm, .env, plugins, etc.) and I cannot get it to actually upload to HubSpot
I was so close to finally understanding how this works (I thoughts)!

Is this equivalent to a success message?
```[19:37:05] Version: webpack 4.46.0
Built at: 05/04/2021 7:37:05 PM
                  Asset      Size  Chunks             Chunk Names
dist/js/index.bundle.js  2.77 KiB       0  [emitted]  index
Entrypoint index = dist/js/index.bundle.js```

NO, THIS IS A SUCCESS MESSAGE:
```[HubSpotAutoUploadPlugin] Uploaded gulp-pack-boilerplate/index.js to account xxxxxxxx```
WOOOOOOO!
